DOC.brief_title: Walk With Ease Program For Patients With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate effect `` Walk With Ease '' , moderate-intensity exercise program , pain , stiffness , fatigue cause lupus . Participants receive copy `` Walk With Ease '' workbook , publication Arthritis Foundation . Participants complete self-reported outcome questionnaires prior begin program six week late completion program . The questionnaire include visual analog scale pain , stiffness , fatigue well FACIT-Fatigue form . Participants also complete satisfaction survey end program .
